version_description: Merci de vous entraîner sur Kinomap. Nous travaillons au quotidien pour vous offrir la meilleure expérience possible.

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Better display of usernames and video titles containing emojis
- Fixed a bug with slipstream effect for multiplayer games

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Fixed a bug with Domyos treadmill start/stop buttons
- Bug fixes

- Fixed resistance sent issue to iConsole equipment in video mode
- Added Kettler equipment in Profile training mode
- Fixed a display issue with the slope to come at the end of the training
- Bug fixes

- more social with news feed, ability to find and follow users and video makers, like and comment videos and activities,...
- more user friendly, especially while training
Introduction of indoor user-generated coaching videos

Thanks for training on Kinomap. We work daily to provide you the best experience on the App.
This new version allows a remote display: broadcast the training screen on a web browser or on the Kinomap screen of the Apple TV.

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Now possible to type a code to pair your device to a browser on top of the QR code method
- Confirm your health status on first training
- Compatibility with FitShow rowing machines
- Default filter to display videos longer than 15 minutes
- bug fixes and other improvements

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Access to the old interface is no longer available in order to improve the performance of the application
- Added environment tags on videos
- Added statistics of your activities month by month
- Bugs fixes

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Multiplayer is back and better than ever: join a scheduled session or create your own to invite your followers
- When you download a video, you can now train completely offline
- Bugs fixes and improvements

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.

- When you download a video, you can now train completely offline
- Switch between accounts easily when in a family plan
- Bugs fixes and improvements

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- The chart is now displayed bigger for a better visibility
- The training can now be remote-controlled on an external display (HDMI, Apple TV)
- Better image display management
- The contributor has been removed from the list of players in Challenge mode to avoid confusion between his position and the position of the video
- In multiplayer, players who have finished training and left the game now remain displayed in the ranking of the other players

Thanks for training on Kinomap. Our daily concern is offering you the best experience there is.
- Now, when you add or remove an equipment, the videos lists are filtered on the type of your equipment (if you have a cycling equipment, you will only see cycling videos. If you want to see the other videos, you can filter on the sport manually via the videos lists)
